name: Professor Quackerton in: The Locked Birdhouse
name_original: Professor Quackerton in: The Locked Birdhouse
description:
Professor Quackerton regales you with a tale of her youth. When a dear friend passes, there is little to be done, but to celebrate her life. Trouble is, everything seems to be going wrong. This game was created in 10 days for the (unexpectedly cancelled) Random Asset Flip jam. All of the rules disappeared when the jam did, but they were roughly: not allowed to make any new assets (but some recoloring is okay). If there were other rules I do not know what they were! With that in mind, here are all of the art credits: Character Art by Julie de Graag
  • Dog
  • Cat (awake)
  • Cat (asleep)
  • Two Owls
Backgrounds and Frames
  • The River Oise near Pontoise by Camille Pissarro
  • Poplars, Éragny by Camille Pissarro
  • Edge of the Woods Near L'Hermitage, Pontoise by Camille Pissarro
  • Landscape at Saint-Charles, near Gisors, Sunset by Camille Pissarro
  • Girl Carrying a Basket (1882) by Winslow Homer
  • Eastern Point by Winslow Homer
  • Northeaster (1895) by Winslow Homer
  • Endpaper from Les oeuvres morales de Mr. Diderot via The MET
  • Blue marigold illustration by William Morris
  • Willow bough vintage illustration by William Morris
  • Jasmine by William Morris
  • Study sketch of ducks by Julie de Graag
  • Woodcut Ornaments by Julie de Graag
  • Florida Days by Louis K. Harlow / British Library
  • Bluebeard; or, Fickle Fatima and the Fatal Key via the British Library
  • Notra Voyage via the British Library
  • Jezebel's Daughter via the British Library
  • The Cycle Directory via the British Library
  • Embracing all the towns and villages via the British Library
  • St John the Baptist via the British Library
  • Flowers of Song via the British Library
  • Papers for Thoughtful Girls via the British Library
Miscellaneous Images
  • Duck and cat by flanneldenim
Fonts
  • Bitter by Huerta Tipográfica (via Google Fonts)
  • Romulous by Pix3M
  • Alagard by Pix3M
Sound and Music
  • Zippo Click by dawith
  • Menu Roll by mikeask
  • Lonely Witch Loop by HorrorPen
  • House in a Forest Loop by HorrorPen
  • One by pheonton
  • Soft Mysterious Harp Loop by VWolfdog
  • Contemplation by Joth
  • Salt Marsh Birds by Matthew Pablo
Devlog detailing where and how I find public domain and creative commons assets coming very soon

(further information coming soon; boy are my arms tired! play it n let me know what you think <3 )
